command_group: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan listing
description: Manage a Marketplace offer plan's listing.

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan listing show
commands.summary: Get the plan listing of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer plan listing show --id
                                                     --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan listing show --offer-id MyOfferId --plan-id MyPlanId

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan listing update
commands.summary: Update the plan listing of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer plan listing update --id
                                                       --offer-id
                                                       [--add]
                                                       [--description]
                                                       [--force-string]
                                                       [--name]
                                                       [--remove]
                                                       [--set]
                                                       [--summary]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan listing update --offer-id MyOfferId                     --plan-id MyPlanId --description "Plan listing description"
